original_title: Denise Austin: Hit The Spot Pilates
overview: Fitness guru Denise Austin offers seven different Pilates workouts, each of which targets a different trouble spot. Her customized routines focus on effective methods for achieving leaner and tighter hips, thighs, abs, and buns. A clip from this workout video also appears in the movie Step Brothers.
title: Denise Austin: Hit The Spot Pilates
